# bottomLeading

**Type Property**

A guide that marks the bottom and leading edges of the view.

## Declaration

```swift
static let bottomLeading: Alignment
```

## Discussion

This alignment combines the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/HorizontalAlignment/leading] horizontal guide and the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/VerticalAlignment/bottom] vertical guide:



## Getting bottom guides

- **bottom**: A guide that marks the bottom edge of the view.
- **bottomTrailing**: A guide that marks the bottom and trailing edges of the view.
